name: Stay together, clones !
description:
Locked in an unfriendly dungeon, you'll have to survive many hardships with your coloured clones. Lead them through the rooms and try to perform the best score by achieving various objectives !

Features
  • Take control of a snake-like group of clones
  • Try to survive a determined time for each room
  • Complete funny and various objectives to score
  • Show your friends who's the best
Credits

Unity & GD : Esteban Marques (https://sackpote.itch.io)

Art : Philadelfia (https://itch.io/profile/philadelfia)

Sound design : Spitch (https://spitch270.itch.io)

Game design : Antoine Lefevre (https://antoinelfvre.itch.io)

--------

Made by students of the Université de Lorraine for the ScoreSpace Jam.
